message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm initially offering it at $1,150,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,050,000. I believe it's a great opportunity, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. I'm confident this product will exceed the value you place on it. Considering its potential, I can bring it down to $1,100,000. This is a very competitive price for what it offers.

I understand that you're confident in the product's value, but I still believe $1,050,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,075,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To show you I'm serious about closing this deal, I'm willing to come down to $1,090,000. This is my final offer, as I believe it reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'll offer $1,075,000. I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.
